software.name: pitfall
software.notes: left/right column sprites don't wraparound properly (webs in stage 1, first boss intro roar) (verify) Waterfall in stage 2 is static on left side, looks less prominent in YT videos (verify) Randomly crashed once during stage 2 Reportedly runs at 30 FPS on real HW
